name: Patrick's Black and White World
description:
AD to move Space to Jump

(Warning Game is Heavy may take a few Seconds to load up)

Volume is low enough not to destroy eardrums :)

This is our submission to the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3 - This Game Jams Theme is Less is More, to follow what theme we limited our color scale and presented that sometimes getting rid of something can make your life, and the level, easier.

So we are introducing our Game Patrick's Black and White World, Patrick is just a gray little person who has found himself in some trouble, he doesn't know how he got there and doesn't remember much. But what he does know is something is wrong the world seems too bright and too dark at the same time. Help Patrick find out what's going on and how he could possible get home.

Created By:

Josef(josefyenko1.itch.io), Briana(Brianafigueroa.itch.io), Evan(GrizzlyBean.itch.io), &Luiz(Neuraa.itch.io)
